Package persistance

Interface SongDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SongDDBBDAO
public interface SongDAO
Interface used for accessing the songs

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addSong​(Song song)
    Adds a song to the database
    boolean addVirtualSong​(Song song)
    Adds a song with a virtual creator to the database
    boolean deleteSong​(Song song)
    Deletes a song from the database
    boolean deleteUserSongs​(java.lang.String user)
    Deletes all the songs created by the specified user
    boolean existsSong​(Song song)
    Checks if the specified song exists in the database
    java.util.ArrayList<Song> getAccessibleSongs​(java.lang.String loggedUser)
    Obtains all the songs from the user and the public ones /!
    java.lang.Boolean isAuthor​(Song song, java.lang.String name)
    Checks if the registered user is the author of the song
    boolean updateSong​(Song song)
    Given a song with basic attributes (name, date, author), obtains the rest of the information

  • Method Details

    • addSong

      boolean addSong​(Song song)
      Adds a song to the database
      Parameters:
      song - Song to add
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • addVirtualSong

      boolean addVirtualSong​(Song song)
      Adds a song with a virtual creator to the database
      Parameters:
      song - Song to be added
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • deleteSong

      boolean deleteSong​(Song song)
      Deletes a song from the database
      Parameters:
      song - Song to be deleted
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • existsSong

      boolean existsSong​(Song song)
      Checks if the specified song exists in the database
      Parameters:
      song - Song to look for
      Returns:
      True if the song exists

    • deleteUserSongs

      boolean deleteUserSongs​(java.lang.String user)
      Deletes all the songs created by the specified user
      Parameters:
      user - User to delete the songs from
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • isAuthor

      java.lang.Boolean isAuthor​(Song song, java.lang.String name)
      Checks if the registered user is the author of the song
      Parameters:
      song - Song to check
      name - Registered user to check
      Returns:
      If it's the author (true), or not (false); null if something went wrong

    • updateSong

      boolean updateSong​(Song song)
      Given a song with basic attributes (name, date, author), obtains the rest of the information
      Parameters:
      song - Song to fill
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful

    • getAccessibleSongs

      java.util.ArrayList<Song> getAccessibleSongs​(java.lang.String loggedUser)
      Obtains all the songs from the user and the public ones /!\ Only the basic information of every song is loaded (there are no notes)
      Parameters:
      loggedUser - User logged in the app
      Returns:
      The songs the user should be able to see
